column4: I've screwed gnome when i deleted xorg.conf i can't get it back working
hummmmmm   so either gnome is buggered up or X is?
I guess deleting the  hidden  .gnome folders in your home folder should take care of it,  but if you can't log in well  you need to do it in the Ubuntu console or from Live CD
i'll give it a shot and come back. Thanks alot!
you don't have Kubuntu or antyhing like that installed?
no other desktop environment or window manager?
ok well can you log into KDE4
ok your issue has nothing to do with X
you won't need Live CD to fix it, since you can log into KDE4
maybe your in KDE4 right now?
well  user settings for all programs go in home in hidden .folders so  deleting any folders to do with gnome should probably take care of it
yep get rid of them all
Many Thanks ( I'll BE BACK the terminator :P)
yes try log into Gnome now
well you could re install it
